---

I've updated the `.env` file with all the Firebase configuration values. I've:
1. Replaced all the placeholder values with the actual Firebase configuration values
2. Added the `VITE_FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID` variable which was present in your Firebase config
3. Removed the duplicate Firebase configuration object that was below the environment variables
4. Maintained the proper environment variable format with quotes around the values

The environment variables are now properly set up and can be used in your Vite application. Remember that these environment variables will be accessible in your application through `import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_*`.
